description: Police are investigating after footage appears to show an officer kneeling on the man's back.
title: Belgian authorities investigate police 'kneeling' death
title_page: Belgian authorities investigate police 'kneeling' death - BBC News
maintext: Thousands of Belgians took to the streets to join solidarity protests and more than 80,000 people have signed a petition calling for statues of King Leopold II, whose rule in the present-day Democratic Republic of Congo killed millions of Africans, to be taken down from the capital Brussels.
